title: KGF Academy
text:
KGF Academy, formerly known as BEML FC, is an Indian <a href="association%20football">football</a> club from <a href="Bangalore">Bangalore</a>. Formed in 2011 went straight into professional football and got accepted into the <a href="I-League%202nd%20Division">I-League 2nd Division</a>, the second tier of football in India.
History.
KGF Academy was founded in 2011 in <a href="Bangalore">Bangalore</a>. In January 2012 they were officially certified by the <a href="All%20India%20Football%20Federation">All India Football Federation</a> to participate in the <a href="I-League%202nd%20Division">I-League 2nd Division</a>, the second tier of football in India.
Players.
First-team.
This list of players at KGF Academy would be decided before the <a href="2013%20I-League%202nd%20Division">2013 I-League 2nd Division</a> season begins.
